website_summaries.verdict: If ever a bedside commode can be described as "stylish", this is it. We appreciate its overall stability, comfortable seating and unobtrusive appearance.
pros: Heavy duty frame, with a 400 lb
Elongated seat design more comfortable for male users
cons: Collection bucket is shallow and messy to use
Chair height may be too tall for smaller users

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking!
customer_reviews.text: I am 6ft tall, 220lb, with MS, Walk very little. 10 feet on a walker to the bathroom is a big deal. Tried 2 other rinky dink bedside pots, and were horrible. The "man package" won't near fit, leaks yuk. Got this today, my brother put it together in 15 minutes. I just tried it, (urinate, which is 95% of what I bought it for) it is perfect. Actually opening is even larger than my bathroom commode. Lots of thought went into this. Bonus? Matches my bedroom suite perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Watchman

customer_reviews.title: SEAT TOO HIGH
customer_reviews.text: Seat TOO HIGH -- I am normal weight (165 #) and 5' 6.5" tall woman. I bought this because of the plastic skirt that hides bucket AND for the plastic platform that prevents the metal bar in front from touching one's thighs when seated. My feet cannot touch the floor on the absolute lowest seat height which is 20 inches from the foor!!! This is ridiculously HIGH for a toilet/commode. So-called right height ADA toilet seats are only 17 inches high. A person under 6 feet tall would like to be able to rest their feet on the floor while eliminating. VERY BAD DESIGN FLAW -- I WOULD NEVER BUY ONE OF THESE AGAIN. WHAT was Medline thinking??
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiest, BEST one available. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best commode you will find. At 20 inches (shortest height), it may be too tall for some short people. However, a previous reviewer used a saw to shorten the chair’s legs, and this chair is well worth the extra effort if the person is very short. Also, previous reviewer ‘Bob Bragg’ (12/18/16) has claimed he had to take it to a car wash to wash it and it was too big to fit in a car. This is nonsense. Fully assembled, it easily fit into my Prius. And if you really wanted to wash it down, you could lay it sideways and run water from a garden hose over the potty section. Easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: P. E.

customer_reviews.title: Shame on the designer and Medline!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this chair! If the patient doesn't get over the commode seat in time, it's impossible to clean without taking the chair apart in order to remove feces and urine under the frame. OR take it to your local car wash in a truck because it's too heavy to carry and too big for most automobiles. I've only had this chair less than a week and the handles that hold the potty are rusting horribly. Shame on the designer and Medline!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Best commode ever
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best commode and the best purchase I made in a long time. It looks better than a typical commode and is extremely sturdy. It is also shaped like a regular elongated toilet which I couldn’t find in any other commodes. My 270 lb husband with limited mobility who was very opposed to using any commode now loves it. I was afraid, based on some reviews, that the bucket will be either too shallow or difficult to clean but neither is the case. I keep about one inch of water in the bucket for easier cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Best bedside commode we have tried.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband with mobility issues. This is sturdy enough to place him on it with a sit to stand lift. Seat back and arm rails are a real plus and help him feel safe. Also like the elongated toilet seat and bucket. Toilet paper holder is convenient. Cleans very easily except for one place. There is a bar that runs across the front under the seat that could get urine on it. It doesn’t come apart there for cleaning. I think if it became necessary to clean that, I could take it outside and hose it out. We really feel this is the best one we’ve had!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Butner

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this for my 95 year old mom who broke her leg. It has been a life saver, while a little bulky it is very sturdy which makes the bulkiness much easier to take. There is also no smell when the lid is closed. While I clean this immediately, there have been times when my mom has used it during the night and in the morning there is no smell in the room with the lid down.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fauth

customer_reviews.title: Pee container too shallow!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy potty chair. There is a serious design issue for my husband....the potty container that holds the pee is too shallow & therefore has to be emptied frequently as his lower man parts drag & get wet.. My solution was to buy a tall waste basket (16 " tall) that fits perfectly under the container that is open on bottom (the one that you use to go over the regular toilet). You can still empty it often....but it takes care of the other problem. Potty is only used at night for #1.....no poo allowed🤭
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and good heigth
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver. I noticed some comments about it being too high. I am 5'4" and I could lower this a great deal more than I have, but it is the perfect height that I have it set on. It keeps me from having to use my bone on bone knees to try and stand up. I am able to stand with ease and even put my knee scooter slightly underneath so I can get my knee right on. One of my best investment to be prepared for Achilles tendon surgery. Updated I actually bought a 2nd one I used in the shower. Life saver for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Howard

customer_reviews.title: portable potty
customer_reviews.text: works great I like that the top you can lift up and down and not put top on the floor assembly was not all that hard to put together either.the color beige with the bronze mix well together you can even use it as a regular chair in the living room and no one would realize right away what it really is.you can even use this chair in shower and nothing happens to it.i would have liked to have had more options as far as color like solid black or other colors offered but over all chair is great love the chair for the patient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This bedside commode worked great for after my surgery. It's very good quality and sturdy. It is also wide enough for larger individuals. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Gayla Denison

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy...with an Aesthetic Appearance...
customer_reviews.text: ...as far as commodes go (:P). It's certainly not your typical, "open-style" bedside toilet of yesteryear. Grandmum is very happy w/this purchase. The overall structure of the chair is solid; it continues to hold up quite well under her weight (205 lbs). The firmly-attached handles are significant when transporting a full pot to the bathroom w/out incident. The hard plastic surface makes daily clean-up a relatively easy chore, while the potty cover and the seat lid helps to minimize odor. We have no complaints. Well worth the money and we would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C L CLARKE

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but too tall
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars as the chair was too tall for my mother. I ha to saw down 2 of the legs. Otherwise is is very attractive (for a commode) especially with a throw pillow on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy easy to clean product
customer_reviews.text: Best piece of equipment coming home from hospital. Easy to use. Secure for wobbly person. Cleaning is a simple lift of a bag and disposal in garbage. Use it now for physical therapy as it is adjustable secure seating for leg kicks etc. could be a really great commode for long term camping when you do not want to dig a hole!
customer_reviews.author: Southwest by southwest

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy item. Used by a relative who is 5'5" & weighs 389 lbs. Even when placed on carpet it remained stable. Left the arms off to accommodate their width & they still felt the commode was safe. We did have to adjust it to almost the lowest height setting. I'm not sure how it would work for someone under 5'3" or so. Easy to clean & wipe down. Very easy to assemble & disassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Shihosa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction. The seat won’t raise!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Paid for have it put together twice! Thinking the instructions were wrong, switched the side rails and sure enough the side Rail is bent inward and won’t allow the seat to raise or lower if you can force it up. Should be easy but holes dont line up and some parts are too wide for the screw to attach to the plastic cover. And worst of all once you get it as best you can because your patient needs it yesterday!
customer_reviews.author: Clay Wilson

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: The best one I have seen and I have worked in elder care for many many years and never seen one that is made as well as this and as easy to clean as ever. No sharp edges, all rounded, so you can get into everything. There is only one thing I wish. I wish it would go down a couple of inches, lower. At 5'7", the feet still don't hit the floor and if on it for too long, the legs go to sleep. Other than that, I can find no other faults with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy commode.
customer_reviews.text: My mom used this commode to also hold onto to stand because it was so sturdy and centered. The liners that you can buy with it make it extra easy to clean and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bee

customer_reviews.title: For tall people only
customer_reviews.text: Height is listed as 19" but is actually 20 3/8". I'm 6" and my heels barely touch floor with shoes. My wife is in a wheel chair and her feet are 2" above the floor. It makes it easy to sit down but very difficult to get her up. Over 99% of women are under 6' and 70% of men. There are 8 height adjustments. It doesn't make sense that the shortest is for such a tall person. It's sturdy and looks nice but not usable for many people.
customer_reviews.author: little auggie

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY a Sturdy, steady bedside commode!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased to find this great sturdy commode. It does not tip easily because of the width and weight of the legs and the chair. It is so more secure than those light weight one. Plus, you can actually sit on the lid. Someone said the pot ended up with excrement on the handles. Not so if you put the bag in properly -- over the handles and all parts of the bucket. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: This commode is very sturdy, and is the best looking commode that I’ve seen. However, it is not made for the average size person. I’m 5’5”-about 150 lbs....when I sat on this HUGE commode, I had to pull myself back as to be properly seated, once positioned, my feet were swinging—-and yes, it was on the bottom notch. I would NOT recommend this product...to anyone under 6’. I will be returning this hazardous commode, immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Integrity

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made bedside commode
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our mother, who is 86 years young and needed a bedside commode after being released from the hospital. It also has been used by a niece with Cerebral Palsy. At first it was too high for our niece, but easy to adjust the legs to the proper height. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly C. Mcchesney

customer_reviews.title: 2 place over toilet know how low u want the commode/educate yourself on what brand of toilet u have
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this 'Medline' product on AMAZON. ... Medline Elements Bedside Commode, Infused with Microban Antimicrobial Protection  ... I purchased this for my 93 year old mother and placed the leg height as low to the floor it could go. It would not go over what I know to be 'a Standard brand toilet' because of the back of the wrap-around bowl-guard ...at least that is what I would call it. No mention of the limitations as to the dimensions of the toilet this will work with - at least I could not find any 'on Amazon'. I will be cutting the back so that it will rest level over 'a Standard brand toilet bowl'. ...see PIC
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Story

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy duty! Up to 400 lbs. It Looks Nice! Easy to assemble! My wife is short so it was too high! Had to cut 3 inches off the bottom of the legs. BUT! We are very Pleased with this Chair!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Scheer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I have a small upstairs bedroom I am using after leg surgery. The room does not have a bathroom so this is a lifesaver. Very sturdy and I added cushions to make it look more like a regular chair. A bit too tall but still an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hochstedler

customer_reviews.title: What’s most important is the multi use of this commode..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this commode for my mother who had a stroke 2 years ago. It was easy to pack in my suitcase and take with me to the Caribbean for my mother. It had a lot of different use such as going taking a shower, using the toilet and putting a cushion and sitting on. My mI’m passed away in December and we gave it to a family friend who loves it and how strong it is. I February my mother’s sister had a stroke and the family need a commode for her so I ordered one and shipped to her house. They said it’s one of the best investment for a stroke victim. Thanks for making it available..
customer_reviews.author: Keith OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Handsome and stable
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this chair. It is functional but doesn’t look like a piece of hospital equipment in my bedroom. I am tall and the height is easily adjustable. I have had no problems with rusting, etc. It is very stable when assembled. My husband was able to put it together without too much problem. I am very happy with this commode and I am glad I spent the extra money since I will be living with it for quite a few years.
customer_reviews.author: jenna powers

customer_reviews.title: Cracks
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in November 2017 and it is now cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and looks much nicer than the other bedside commodes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad and he loves it. It is very sturdy and looks much nicer than the other bedside commodes. The best feature is the elongated toiled seat. It is about the same size as the commode in his bathroom. If you are looking for commode pail liners, I would recommend the TidyCare Commode Liners - Convenience Pack XL.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for my husband to recuperate from open heart surgery. Did a lot of research before pitching this model. My husband is a tall man and this was perfect. Could adjust the height which was nice and the weight limit is more than others I saw. Does not look like a commode and is built very sturdy. I bought the liners and cleanup was a snap. It was well worth the money and recommend it highly. After all, when it comes to a loved one I would gladly spend more so I am assured of my loved one’s safety. Got us thru a rough time. Don’t hesitate to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Excellant in overall  size, sturdiness and appearance.
customer_reviews.text: The legs are too long at the lowest setting. However, it is not difficult to pull the rubber feet and shorten the tubes. I cut 3 inches off which made it just right, at lowest setting, for my 4'11" wife. Still have over 6 inches of lift available if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: The best. This is the sturdiest thing in the house. Made of excellent materials, very reliable and comfortable. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Larry A. Reeve

customer_reviews.title: Item is Now Useless and Needs Replacement
customer_reviews.text: This bedside commode looks great and I had expected it to have a long useful life. However, the collection bucket has deteriorated and cannot be adequately cleaned and sterilized. Because of its unique design a replacement bucket is unavailable. One would think Medline would have a replacement part for sale, but Medline customer service says they do not.
customer_reviews.author: Jayrbee

customer_reviews.title: This is sturdy. A good buy
customer_reviews.text: When I looked for a commode they didn’t look sturdy. Had no cover on the seat. This one is oerfect. I found an identifier one but it was $160.00i ordered it . I thought. But when I checked it I realized I hadn’t finished it. In the mean ti had this pop up on Amazon this one was 110.09
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I put it together for my mother and she lovessss it. She is a tall thick woman so I was worried but once I opened the box I knew immediately that even the hulk could sit on it and it won’t break. GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.author: KRYSTAL

customer_reviews.title: Very useful item
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty cool. Sturdy and easy to assemble. I like that there are single use bags available for it. Very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunna47

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the cheaper ones!
customer_reviews.text: I came home from knee replacement surgery, and used this exclusively for the first couple of weeks. So sturdy, safe, and easy to clean. Doesn't even look half bad. Works for a comfortable chair when necessary too. I'm very pleased with this commode, and I wouldn't even consider purchasing a lesser one.
customer_reviews.author: grandmak

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It's an emergency back-up plan for an elderly parent. As such it hasn't been used yet, but it certainly seems up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: a viewpoint

customer_reviews.title: Just Get It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother who is 84 and has difficulty walking to the bathroom. It is excellent! Strong, easy to clean and she feels comfortable and safe using it all on her on. I will give it 5 starts! Note: mom is 5' 3" and 230 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Rodriguez Torres

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: Large seat opening, good quality. This is 1 of 3 different commodes I bought, and it's definitely the best.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Too high and too large for a small woman.
customer_reviews.text: Height cannot be adjusted for a short person - need 16" height, only goes to 20". Toilet seat is too large for a small woman (100 lbs.) Feels as if she is falling in. Whole thing is like a chair for a giant!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Turner

customer_reviews.title: Discreet chair/commode
customer_reviews.text: I bought this commode for my elderly mom. I love that it looks like a chair and not a potty. How discreet. It is also very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Irie Island Chic

customer_reviews.title: The best commode I've seen
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the very few commodes that has a truly elongated bowl. It's sturdy. It has a top seat that you can sit on comfortably. The only issue is It's tall at it's shortest setting. If you have short legs, they're going to be dangling.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment for handicapped.
customer_reviews.text: My Son loves this chair and it does everything it's supposed to do. Handy and nice looking and discrete.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best and most convenient piece of furniture in our Home/Decorator freindly
customer_reviews.text: Looks great -- like a casual chair. Great asset for our needs. However, the smell of a bowel movement lingers for some time, even after cleaning and disinfecting and spraying. Dissipates over time. We set it up against a Couch so that it does not topple or swing back upon accessing. Works great that way.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a sturdy chair
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy chair, easy to clean. Comfortable for my wife to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Buxton

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and made
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been a great help for my grandfather. The elongated seat helps a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Atty

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a great unit, I got it for my mother. The top seat was a bit too hard
customer_reviews.author: One Stroke

customer_reviews.title: Love the chair -customer service is unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product however, it was missing a necessary bolt that customer service was unable to provide (Home Depot did) which caused the 4 star instead of the 5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This bedside commode is working out nicely for my 95 year old mother on the days that she is feeling too weak to walk to the bathroom. It is nice looking, easy to assemble, easy to adjust & sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was deeper but overall a good commode
customer_reviews.text: The only problem we had was that the “waste area” was not dee enough. My grandmother constantly got her hands dirty while wiping. Otherwise it is a sturdily built commode.
customer_reviews.author: James L Ebarb

customer_reviews.title: It has big opening
customer_reviews.text: My dad is 91 years old Asian man and he is heavy; he can't walk very well now. This chair has big opening which is perfect for him. However we cut 6 cm length of the legs, It is a little bit too tall for the short people. Other than that, my dad is very happy with this toilet chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Bedside Commode
customer_reviews.text: Good Construction and if you have a family member that needs bedside commode, looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Connell Bettano

customer_reviews.title: What a blessing!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my 100 year old mother, it works wonderfully for her. It saves her from needing to walk into the bathroom at night, which is a real blessing! It is well made and was very easy to assemble, I am so happy that I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Grips for the floor are great. Very stable, sturdy for elderly and unstable people. We tested it out with someone who was about 320lb, no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Commode.
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together quickly. It function as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality commode, very sturdy and was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: emmasonlygirl

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates those unsafe nightly trips to the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is more like a piece of bedroom furniture rather than a piece of medical equipment. Mom loves it and has eliminated those nightly multiple visits to the bathroom. Would suggest purchasing absorbent pads to place in the potty chair pan.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair. Didn’t have to look like a commode. Very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to put together and sturdy. Like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: More expensive than the others but easy to assemble and rock solid! Great for heavier people. Buy the liners, makes clean up way easier and less smelly.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Johns

customer_reviews.title: Great commode
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, sturdy, looks better than the usual standard style.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Snyder

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: took awhile to figure out the instructions to put together, but once I did went ok
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M Habzansky

customer_reviews.title: Quit shopping around, this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.text: I’m embarrassed to write a review on a potty chair but every single day I’m glad I bought it. If you need one - this one is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Nice in every way.  Convenient, comfy and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable to fit specific needs, stylish with neutral colors to match most decor.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cook

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair. It is stable and doesn’t look like a commode.
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN GAVIN

customer_reviews.title: It Carries Its Weight!
customer_reviews.text: The chair was purchased for my aunt and she loves it! She likes the fact that it's very sturdy and it looks like a regular chair.
customer_reviews.author: Berma D. Colbert

customer_reviews.title: Assembly reasonable
customer_reviews.text: This product was just as it looked and described. It was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Daniels

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to put together (watching the instructional video)
customer_reviews.text: For transporting purposes, I took it out of the box that it came in, and all the different parts fitted well in my suitcases, Once it got to it's final destination, it was easy to put together (watching the instructional video), it is sturdy, strong and well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My client loved this. It very study and looks great in bedroom. Just the handle on the bucket is rusting from bad aim
customer_reviews.author: caledonia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful value. Easy to assemble. Very sturdy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Louise Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was the best looking commode of all. The therapists are all impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed for our Unsteady Mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mother-in-law. I needed a sturdy safe commode for her to use during the night that I wasn't afraid she would tumble over on. She is unsteady and I worried she would fall so I wanted a good well-balanced chair that would be secure for her. This chair is great. It is also much easier on the eye than most of the cheap seats and was much less embarrassing for her to have in her studio apartment in her retirement home. Toss a blanket over it and place a pillow on it and you would never guess it was a toilet!
customer_reviews.author: GrammaBarb

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: THANK YOU! PROOF TAKING CARE OF A LOVED ONE DOES NOT HAVE TO COST LOTS IN ORDER TO HAVE QUALITY EQUIPMENT!
customer_reviews.author: Kathysm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend Roomy Sturdy Glad I chose this to be bedside after knee surgery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazo the best
customer_reviews.text: It truly came in handy for my elderly mother by her bed. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best Commode
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and big enough to move around in. Highly recommended! !!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad to have by his bed. Very sturdy and easy to use. Makes clean ups easy with the bags purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Not Your Grannys Old Style Flimsy Commode
customer_reviews.text: This attractive commode is everything as advertised, except we as buyers, need to check specifications in reference to height if you are under five foot. Possibly could be added to description. It's just a smidgen short for my height of five feet. Purchased this king size (400 lb capacity) due to "My Big Guys" having knee surgery down the road. Very, very sturdy and easy to put together. Using liners with gel pad to solidify liquids, eliminate odors doing away with unpleasant hand cleaning each time. Use a pail by commode to discard. Much more sanitary, oh and a screen is ordered to go around it for privacy in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, very well designed
customer_reviews.text: Only one available in which pot does not show. Just a little difficult to assemble. Extremely well constructed, very sturdy.Easy to use. Much better than expected. Hides odor very well. Easy to flush and rimse. Was,fearful that it would clog toilet, but it did not. Pot is super well designed, does not spill, 2 handles, closes,tight. I had dreaded emptying, but it turned out right.
customer_reviews.author: QuinnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this because it was nice looking and not so institutional looking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it was nice looking and not so institutional looking. It is a strong quality chair. At first I was concerned about the seeming shallower depth of the catch pan in case of long stiff bowel movements, but it has not been a problem. The only con is the location of the tp holder. The seat hits the roll and knocks it on the floor and once into the used pot. I bent it out a little but still not perfect. I remove the roll and rehang for storage only. It would be nice if the top of the lid was a little padded instead of just hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Joleen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy easy to clean. Works great for large men
customer_reviews.text: This bed side is more like a regular toilet. The seat is as normal size like a normal toilet. Very comfortable. No worries of accidents missing like most bed sides. Especially for a male. Everything fits in the opening. The chair is very stable. I have two of these for two different large men. I feel so much more secure using this bedside. Easy to clean the holding pan. Most times just rinse out. Hardly anything sticks sticks to the pan. The pan lifts right out with ease. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but doesn't fit our toilet.
customer_reviews.text: We got this to replace the one the hospital gave me when I was recovering from a broken leg. It's sturdy and comfortable. But it wouldn't drop down properly into the toilet bowl basin, therefore leaving it too high for me to use with an injured leg. Using a step stool with it defeats the purpose of having an elevated toilet seat. I should have heeded the other reviews. Learn the hard way, I guess. If you need this as just a bedside commode, it's ideal and stylish. But for setting over your toilet bowl, I just hope you are very tall, or prepare to have your legs dangle from it. It's being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F. Curtiss

customer_reviews.title: When you have to have one, this is the one to have!
customer_reviews.text: This 'chair' is so sturdy, even for the largest of folks! Easy to empty. Not the easiest to clean, but not the most difficult either. Toss a throw over it and it doubles a chair next to the bed. I've replaced one, just wears out over time. The one downside is that for a short person, even though the legs are adjustable, they aren't THAT adjustable, and we had to saw a bit off the legs for it to be the best height. I would totally recommend it, however; tis absolutely worth a little sawing!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kelso

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for-five stars!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to assemble. I had trouble with one of the buttons that allows for the adjustment of the back and I may need to get that piece replaced. But the quality is extremely good and I love that I can adjust it to a higher height as I’m pretty long legged. I also included the bags and liners in my purchase and I’m really glad I did, it made it very convenient for my caregiver to dispose of the waste.
customer_reviews.author: VallyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent commode, but too high for short people.
customer_reviews.text: This commode looks nicer than most, and acts as a chair, when not being used as it is intended. Very easy to clean. My only objection, and why I didn't give it 5 stars, it can be raised quite high, but can't be lowered enough. My patient is 5'2" and her feet dangle in the air by at least 3 inches. If you are over 5'6", this would probably be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: midnight

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice for Mom!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my Mom for a temporary pelvic injury. I researched many brands and styles. This Medline commode received the best reviews and looked the best in style and sturdiness. Going into my research the quality and stability were at the top on my list. The Medline model was a little more expensive, but worth it to keep my Mom on the road to healing.
customer_reviews.author: T Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than most chairs of this sort. It has a sturdy feel (many cheaper ones we looked at did not) and is easy to empty and clean. But the real reason to purchase is it looks much better than most bedside commodes. This was purchased for a 80 plus woman who is still quite active but has issues sometimes at night. This chair does not give off as much of a "sick room" vibe as some do. Extremely easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Ginya

customer_reviews.title: Good lookin' and large opening
customer_reviews.text: This is the best looking bedside commode I've seen. The opening is larger than most, and with the lid down makes a nice bedside chair for visitors. It's solid, doesn't feel flimsy or rickety. Sadly, we had to return it because my nearly-100-year-old skinny dad wasn't comfortable with the larger size of it.
customer_reviews.author: GSP and Dane Lady

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: Although my elderly mother has some mental challenges, she is very aware of aesthetics and refused to have a bedside commode for months. This chair blends in nicely with other furniture in the bedroom and functions perfectly as a bedside commode. It is sturdy, and easily height adjustable. Using it with pail liners makes an easy disposing of the waste. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John Noll

customer_reviews.title: SUPERIOR commode
customer_reviews.text: This is a SUPERIOR commode on every level. I bought another brand which did not fit a elderly 6-foot man at all - too small=big mess. It looks great in the bedroom and it's extremely comfortable and secure. It took a little bit of time to assemble but the instructions were clear and easy to follow. It's worth every penny and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: squeegee

customer_reviews.title: Totally got my money's worth on this bedside potty
customer_reviews.text: Physical therapists, occupational therapists and nurses have commented that this is definitely the cadillac of the potty seats. Mom fell a couple of times trying to use the light-weight aluminum version because of it's instability. This seat is sturdy and easy to clean. You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda L. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, well built Very stable even when a ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, well built Very stable even when a lot of weight on one side when maneuvering about. Worth the price. Make sure they don't charge tax. It's tax exempt medical durable goods. (At least in NJ) so probably everywhere else, too.
customer_reviews.author: D. McNulty

customer_reviews.title: My elderly mother fell getting on or off this thing and got her arm caught!
customer_reviews.text: It's possible to get your arm caught between the handle stem and the back tubes. She was lucky the arm was not broken! The arms need a redesign to prevent this. Mercy
customer_reviews.author: I know nothing.

customer_reviews.title: Easily put together
customer_reviews.text: Easily put together. Don't do it when you are tired. LOL! Very supportive, sturdy, great product! The only thing I would complain about is the toilet paper holder. When the lid is lifted, it hits the toilet paper holder. Now I have moved the arms every which way, but it is still problematic. Despite, this awesome - worth the money product!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bolling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Had a little difficulty with the assembly but once together I believe it was worth paying more. Very sturdy - doesn't wobble/rock.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne R Jones

customer_reviews.title: BIG
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad who has been in the hospital for a while and is unable to walk at this time-this is great for tall people (and short because it’s adjustable). Seems very well-made and sturdy enough and I love that it does not look like a hospital commode. I put it together easily-needs no tools. Love that it has a lid and handles on the inside bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer💫

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Not as wide as I'd like but I can live with that. I don't like the way the arms bend inward instead of being straight because I am wide in the hips and it rubs against them, but other than that one little thing this is a very good chair.
customer_reviews.author: Orla A. Nickell

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product. I bought this bedside toilet originally in 2019. These last along time. I am over 300 lbs so it's sturdy and held up remarkably. I bought a new one so I would have one in two rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Jdeltateacher

customer_reviews.title: RUN DON'T STOP. IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR THE BEST BEDSIDE COMMODE THIS IS IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought another one, sent it back. Got this one, size is very nice. One of the best purchases I have made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: chutson

product_meta.title: Medline MDS89664ELMB Elements Bedside Commode, Shape
product_meta.description:
Now there’s an alternative to the white, institutional look of typical bath aids. Medline’s premium Bedside Commode features a dark bronze finish, contoured seating, and muted colors that helps make a home look like a home, not a hospital. Innovative design makes the Elements Bedside Commode easy to adjust for customized comfort and added safety. Fine tune the heights of the seat, armrests and back with simple push buttons and knobs to fit your needs. This bedside commode is infused with Microban Antimicrobial Technology. Microban antimicrobial technology inhibits the growth of stains and odors from bacteria, mold & mildew and keeps your bath safety products cleaner for longer. Microban protection is built-in during the manufacturing process and won't wash off between routine cleanings or wear away—providing continuous antimicrobial protection for the life of the product.This product has antimicrobial properties built-in to protect the product. This product does not protect users or others against bacteria, viruses, germs or other disease organisms.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
800-633-5463
feature_bullets: Height-adjustable seat and armrest aid getting on and off; Seat adjusts in 0.5" increments for a perfect fit;Dark bronze finish and style suits most decors
Elongated seat opening and adjustable contoured backrest ensures roomy comfort; Height of the product leg - 19 inches

Flat-seat lid cover discretely conceals commode when not in use, elongated seat opening ensures roomy comfort. Can be used over toilet to raise seat, enhancing stability, splash guard included for over-the-toilet use
Supports up to 400 pounds, tool-free assembly; Commode height can be adjusted in increments of .5” to a maximum of 22.5” tall. Not sterile

This shower chair is infused with Microban Antimicrobial Technology | Microban antimicrobial technology inhibits the growth of stains and odors from bacteria, mold & mildew and keeps your bath safety products cleaner for longer

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
